2: I wasn't expecting to be able to keep up with you.
4: You sure like to stop and smell the roses.

3: Are you... walking slower so I can keep up?
...We just need to cross this street, and we'll be there.

2: Why are you wearing a hoodie?

3: I just don't want any unnecessary trouble.
I don't know. I just don't want any unnecessary trouble.
An unfamiliar girl runs up and stops in front of Lee, then sticks her arms out and stops him. For some reason, her face has a tinge of red. Perhaps, it was from running over here.
You're my kinda type! Can I have your ID number?

Lee refrains from turning his head as if trying to restrain himself.
